colophon.para: Mark Baker is a twenty-five-year veteran of the technical communication industry, with particular experience developing task-oriented, topic-based content, and in designing and implementing structured authoring systems. He is also a frequent speaker on matters related to technical communications and structured authoring, and contributes to several publications in the field. Mark is currently President and Principal Consultant for Analecta Communications, Inc. in Ottawa, Canada.
